name: Swiping BallZ
description:
Swiping BallZ is a tricky play of colors.

Lead your character ever further into the labyrinth. Find the right way.

Can you use color to maximize your score in the right order and escape the threat of danger?

Practice the high score and measure your skills with the worldwide community.

Post your records on social networks and inspire others!

Function Notes:

+ Random world
+ High score
+ Leaderboard
